About Us

Find Us Via dei Serpenti, 87 184 Roma RM, Italia

Who we are

Established in 1983, we pride ourselves on being a family owned and operated restaurant who uses the freshest and finest ingredients to make our Italian specialties! Whether you are in the mood for pizza, lasagna, antipasto salad, or just a true home-cooked meal, you are sure to find a delicious "home cooked" meal when you dine with us!

Why people choose us

Friendly team
